class TValueItemDelegate

Detailed Description

Value Browser widget.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum TValueBrowser::ELinkedType

Enumerates types of linked values.

enum TValueBrowser::EStoringPolicy

Enumerates storing policies.

See also:
storingPolicy(), setStoringPolicy(), writeDataSet(), readDataSet()
Enumerator:
SP_RAW  imports/exports current dataset (shown in Browser)
SP_STORED  imports/exports stored dataset
SP_LINKED  imports/exports linked data

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TValueBrowser::TValueBrowser ( QWidget *  parent = 0,
unsigned int  itemDefHeight = 18 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
parent is the parent widget (0 by default).
name is the internal name (0 by default).
itemDefHeight is the default height of an item (18 by default).

unsigned int TValueBrowser::widthScale (  )  const [inline]

Returns width scale keeped by leftmost columns.

See also:
setWidthScale()
Since:
3.1.3

void TValueBrowser::setWidthScale ( unsigned int  scale  ) 

Sets width scale keeped by leftmost columns (i.e. 50 = 1/2 of total size, 75 = 3/4 and so on). scale can be in range between 5 and 95.

See also:
widthScale()
Since:
3.1.3

int TValueBrowser::page (  )  const [inline]

Returns the number of the current page.

bool TValueBrowser::checkEditor (  )  const [inline]

Returns true if Value Browser is in edit mode, false if not.

SpecialValueList* TValueBrowser::specialList (  )  const [inline]

Returns Special Value List assigned privately.

See also:
setSpecialList()

void TValueBrowser::setSpecialList ( SpecialValueList *  nameList = 0,
bool  freeOld = false 
)

Sets Special Value List "nameList" privately. By default, TValueBrowser does not have any Special Value List set. If "nameList" is NULL, list will be removed. If "freeOld" is true, list assigned previously will be deleted.

See also:
specialList()

void TValueBrowser::setChangeInfo ( bool  ci  ) 

Sets change information mode (default is true). If the value is true, then all the changes made before the data set was stored will be highlighted.

See also:
changeInfo()

bool TValueBrowser::changeInfo (  )  const [inline]

Returns change information mode.

See also:
setChangeInfo()

bool TValueBrowser::setItemLevel ( TBaseItem *  item,
int  level 
)

Sets level of item to level. This is need to be used for own values only, followed with quick-added children.

Quick-add method to add a page and make it current one.

TColorValue* TValueBrowser::addColor ( int  level,
const QString &  name,
const QString &  hint = QString::null,
const QString &  propertyName = QString::null,
void *  linked = 0,
TColorList *  list = 0 
)

Quick-add method to add a color. By default, own values are on, autoappending is off, and the list is filled by 16 base colors.

void TValueBrowser::setStoringPolicy ( EStoringPolicy  policy  ) 

Sets current storing policy to policy.

See also:
storingPolicy(), writeDataSet(), readDataSet()

EStoringPolicy TValueBrowser::storingPolicy (  )  const [inline]

Retrieves current storing policy. Default is TValueBrowser::SP_RAW.

See also:
setStoringPolicy(), writeDataSet(), readDataSet()

void TValueBrowser::writeDataSet ( QSettings &  set  ) 

Stores linked values to set using current storing policy.

See also:
storingPolicy(), setStoringPolicy(), readDataSet()

void TValueBrowser::readDataSet ( QSettings &  set  ) 

Reads linked values from set using current storing policy.

See also:
storingPolicy(), setStoringPolicy(), writeDataSet()

void TValueBrowser::clear (  )  [slot]

Clears all items and pages count.

Since:
3.2.4

void TValueBrowser::switchPage ( int  page  )  [slot]

Makes a page with index "page" current. Does nothing if such page does not exist.

void TValueBrowser::switchPage ( const QModelIndex &  index  )  [slot]

Makes a page with index "page" current. Does nothing if such page does not exist. Added for compatibility with MVC-based views. For example, this slot can be connected directly with QAbstractItemView::activated() signal, to provide listview-based menu.

Since:
3.2.4

void TValueBrowser::storeSet ( bool  emitChanges = false  )  [slot]

Stores current data. The data is stored into internal dataset.

See also:
restoreSet()

void TValueBrowser::restoreSet (  )  [slot]

Restores data previously stored in internal dataset by storeSet() method.

See also:
storeSet()

void TValueBrowser::updateFromLinked (  )  [slot]

Reads values from linked variables and puts them to the browser.

void TValueBrowser::updateLinked (  )  [slot]

Stores current values from the browser to linked ones.

void TValueBrowser::ItemChanged ( TBaseItem *  item  )  [signal]

Emitted when the value of the item "item" is changed.

void TValueBrowser::HintChanged ( const QString &  hint,
TBaseItem *  item = 0,
const QString &  itemName = 0 
) [signal]

Emitted when the item's "item" hint is changed, or item has become current. You can connect this signal with your slot which will display this hint.

Parameters:
item item caused hint change,
itemName is the name of the item,
hint is the hint text.

void TValueBrowser::ValuePicked ( TBaseItem *  item,
const SValue &  value 
) [signal]

Emitted when the value of the item "item" is picked by the user.

virtual void TValueBrowser::selectionChanged ( QTreeWidgetItem *  item,
QTreeWidgetItem *  prevItem 
) [protected, virtual, slot]

Emitted when the value or check state of the item "item" is changed while storing.

Member Data Documentation

SpecialValueList TValueBrowser::s_specialList [static]

Holds Special Value List which is common for all the Value Browsers.

QIcon TValueBrowser::s_defaultRevertIcon [static]

Holds default revert icon which is common for all the Value Browsers (remains until setRevertIcon() called).

Since:
3.3
See also:
revertIcon(), setRevertIcon()
